td.content: s:M pastor aged 32 ys presents with moderate cough for more than 9 days. Denies ever using tobacco consumes more than 4 alcoholic drinks daily o:Height 166 cm, Weight 57.1 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, wheeze-LU, wheeze-BIL, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, crackles-LL a:Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to pulmonary disease.

td.content: s:pt with C/O severe shortness of breath, severe fever, severe cough and Respiratory. patient is a 32 YO male pastor. o:Height 165 cm, Weight 55.4 kg, Temperature 36.5 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, actively coughing with sputum production - dark yellow, Neck = no JVD a:Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered CT Chest.

content2.Unmatched: sputum production - dark yellow , Neck = no JVD

td.content: s:33 yr old male presents with 2 days history of worsening severe fever, severe shortness of breath, severe cough and Respiratory. he is a chronic alcoholic he does not smoke o:Height 166 cm, Weight 57 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16, CT Chest demonstrates areas of centriacinar emphysema, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, actively coughing with sputum production - dark yellow, Neck = no JVD a:Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease p:administered salmeterol - 50 mcg (inhaled) 2xday, performed CT Chest, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

content2.Unmatched: sputum production - dark yellow , Neck = no JVD
